deprecated: Feathers v3 is out and this module has moved to @feathersjs/client. See https://docs.feathersjs.com/migrating.html for more information.
description: A module that consolidates Feathers client modules for REST (jQuery, Request, Superagent) and Websocket (Socket.io, Primus) connections
name: feathers-client

scripts.add-dist: npm run clean && npm run browserify:dist && npm run browserify:min && git add dist/ --force && git commit -am "Updating dist"
scripts.bower: node version && git add bower.json && git commit -am "Update version"
scripts.browserify: npm run browserify:dist && npm run browserify:min && npm run browserify:test
scripts.browserify:min: browserify src/client.js -t babelify --standalone feathers | uglifyjs > dist/feathers.min.js
scripts.changelog: github_changelog_generator && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -am "Updating changelog"
scripts.clean: shx rm -rf dist/ && shx mkdir -p dist
scripts.compile: shx rm -rf lib/ && babel -d lib/ src/
scripts.publish: git push origin --tags && npm run changelog && git push origin
scripts.release:major: npm run reinstall && npm run add-dist && npm version major && npm run bower && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm run reinstall && npm run add-dist && npm version minor && npm run bower && npm publish
scripts.release:patch: npm run reinstall && npm run add-dist && npm version patch && npm run bower && npm publish
scripts.release:prerelease: npm run reinstall && npm run add-dist && npm version prerelease && npm run bower && npm publish --tag pre
scripts.test: npm run clean && npm run browserify && npm run lint && npm run coverage
